brief_description: We measured the transcriptional responses of four human APC subsets to microbial vaccine challenge in vitro. We identified common and specific signatures, highlighting subset-specific responses to vaccines.
brief_title: DC transcriptomics in response to vaccines
condition_studied: Response to vaccine challenge in vitro
description: The mechanisms by which microbial vaccines interact with human APCs remain elusive.
hypothesis: Different vaccines will induce distinct early transcriptional events in human APC populations.
objectives: To define the early transcriptional fingerprints of four human APC populations in response to thirteen microbial vaccines and establish DC maturation profiles following vaccine challenge.
official_title: Transcriptional specialization of human dendritic cell subsets in response to microbial vaccines

arm.description: Cell subsets invitro exposure to virus and bacteria
arm.name: HIPC1_CELLSUBS_INVITRO

pubmed.title: Transcriptional specialization of human dendritic cell subsets in response to microbial vaccines.

program.contract_name: Systems Analysis Vaccine Responses in Healthy and Hyporesponsive Humans
